data.lyric:
[ti:You Belong With Me]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Fearless (Platinum Edition)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]You Belong With Me (Taylor's Version) - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:02.58]Lyrics by：Taylor Swift/Liz Rose
[00:05.17]Composed by：Taylor Swift/Liz Rose
[00:07.76]You're on the phone with your girlfriend
[00:10.37]She's upset
[00:11.64]She's going off about something that you said
[00:15.39]'Cause she doesn't get your humor like I do
[00:20.16]
[00:22.41]I'm in my room
[00:23.79]It's a typical Tuesday night
[00:26.46]I'm listening to the kind of music she doesn't like
[00:30.17]And she'll never know your story like I do
[00:35.15]
[00:37.06]'Cause she wears short skirts
[00:38.92]I wear T-shirts
[00:40.84]She's cheer captain
[00:42.34]And I'm on the bleachers
[00:44.49]Dreaming about the day when you wake up
[00:46.98]And find that what you're looking for has been here the whole time
[00:51.43]If you could see that I'm the one who understands you
[00:55.60]Been here all along so why can't you see
[01:01.60]You belong with me
[01:04.60]
[01:05.17]You belong with me
[01:06.98]
[01:10.58]Walkin' the streets with you and your worn-out jeans
[01:14.43]I can't help thinking this is how it ought to be
[01:18.24]Laughing on a park bench thinking to myself
[01:21.95]Hey isn't this easy
[01:24.57]
[01:25.14]And you've got a smile that could light up this whole town
[01:29.16]I haven't seen it in a while since she brought you down
[01:32.91]You say you're fine
[01:33.91]I know you better than that
[01:35.74]
[01:36.50]Hey whatcha doing with a girl like that
[01:39.79]She wears high heels
[01:41.68]I wear sneakers
[01:43.07]
[01:43.59]She's cheer captain and I'm on the bleachers
[01:47.22]Dreaming about the day when you wake up
[01:49.78]And find that what you're looking for has been here the whole time
[01:54.20]If you could see that I'm the one who understands you
[01:58.29]Been here all along so why can't you see
[02:04.38]You belong with me
[02:08.55]
[02:09.41]Standing by and waiting at your back door
[02:13.06]All this time how could you not know
[02:16.34]Baby you belong with me
[02:22.09]
[02:23.04]You belong with me
[02:24.62]
[02:37.02]Oh I remember you drivin' to my house in the middle of the night
[02:42.41]I'm the one who makes you laugh
[02:44.16]When you know you're about to cry
[02:46.22]I  know your favorite songs
[02:47.84]And you tell me about your dreams
[02:49.60]Think I know where you belong
[02:51.42]Think I know it's with me
[02:54.31]
[02:55.26]Can't you see that I'm the one who understands you
[02:59.19]Been here all along so why can't you see
[03:04.74]
[03:05.33]You belong with me
[03:08.85]
[03:10.31]Standing by and waiting at your back door
[03:14.08]All this time
[03:15.53]How could you not know
[03:17.27]Baby you belong with me
[03:22.89]
[03:24.06]You belong with me
[03:25.41]
[03:27.51]You belong with me
[03:29.51]
[03:30.36]Have you ever thought just maybe
[03:34.91]You belong with me
[03:37.81]
[03:38.75]You belong with me
data.trans:
[ti:我们在一起才合适]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Fearless (Platinum Edition)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.58]//
[00:05.17]//
[00:07.76]你在电话里与你的女朋友谈心
[00:10.37]她心烦意乱
[00:11.64]她不想听你说的那些事
[00:15.39]她不像我那样懂得你的幽默
[00:20.16]
[00:22.41]我在房间里
[00:23.79]那是一个很平常的周二晚上
[00:26.46]我正在听着她不喜欢的音乐
[00:30.17]她永远不会像我一样知道你的故事
[00:35.15]
[00:37.06]但她穿短裙
[00:38.92]我穿T恤
[00:40.84]她是啦啦队队长
[00:42.34]而我是露台上的看客
[00:44.49]梦想着这一天 当你醒来
[00:46.98]你会发现你一直在找的东西就在你身边
[00:51.43]你应该能看到我是唯一能理解你的人
[00:55.60]一直在你左右 你为什么看不见呢 
[01:01.60]我们在一起才合适
[01:04.60]
[01:05.17]我们在一起才合适
[01:06.98]
[01:10.58]你穿着破旧的牛仔裤和我走在街上
[01:14.43]我情不自禁地想它怎么可以这样
[01:18.24]我坐在公园的长椅上因为自己而大笑
[01:21.95]这不是很容易吗
[01:24.57]
[01:25.14]你笑了 那微笑可以照亮整个世界
[01:29.16]我好长时间都没有再见过那样的笑容了 自从她令你情绪失落
[01:32.91]你说你很好
[01:33.91]我知道你应该比这更好的
[01:35.74]
[01:36.50]对于那样的女生你会怎样
[01:39.79]她穿着高跟鞋
[01:41.68]我穿着运动鞋
[01:43.07]
[01:43.59]她是啦啦队队长 而我是露台上的看客
[01:47.22]梦想着这一天 当你醒来
[01:49.78]你会发现你一直在找的东西就在你身边
[01:54.20]你应该能看到我是唯一能理解你的人
[01:58.29]一直在你左右 你为什么看不见呢 
[02:04.38]我们在一起才合适
[02:08.55]
[02:09.41]我在你家后门等你
[02:13.06]亲爱的 这么长时间了你怎么可能不知道呢
[02:16.34]亲爱的 我们在一起才合适
[02:22.09]
[02:23.04]我们在一起才合适
[02:24.62]
[02:37.02]我记得 你半夜开车去我家
[02:42.41]我是唯一能让你笑的人
[02:44.16]当你知道自己要哭的时候
[02:46.22]我知道你最喜欢听什么歌
[02:47.84]你告诉过我你的梦想
[02:49.60]我想我知道你属于哪里
[02:51.42]我认为你应该和我在一起
[02:54.31]
[02:55.26]你应该能看到我是唯一能理解你的人
[02:59.19]一直在你左右 你为什么看不见呢 
[03:04.74]
[03:05.33]我们在一起才合适
[03:08.85]
[03:10.31]我在你家后门等你
[03:14.08]亲爱的 这么长时间了
[03:15.53]你怎么可能不知道呢
[03:17.27]亲爱的 我们在一起才合适
[03:22.89]
[03:24.06]我们在一起才合适
[03:25.41]
[03:27.51]我们在一起才合适
[03:29.51]
[03:30.36]你有没有想过这种可能呢
[03:34.91]我们在一起才合适
[03:37.81]
[03:38.75]我们在一起才合适
